title: SIN
content:
0x0BADBFA3B172435F0xBF987F58// Sin
float SIN(float value);Parameters:value: The number of degrees (in degrees, not radians)Returns: The sine of the given numberReturns the sine of the given number.Examples:Lua-- Get the heading
local heading = GetEntityHeading(PlayerPedId())
local sin = Sin(heading)

-- equivalent in lua
local sinLua = math.sin(heading * (math.pi / 180))
codeBlocks:
-- Get the heading
local heading = GetEntityHeading(PlayerPedId())
local sin = Sin(heading)

-- equivalent in lua
local sinLua = math.sin(heading * (math.pi / 180))
